The Rock Garden of Chandigarh is a sculpture garden in Chandigarh, India. It is also known as Nek Chand Rock Garden after its founder Nek Chand, a government official who started the garden secretly in his spare time in 1957. Today it is spread over an area of 40 acres (161874.25 mÂ²). It is completely built of industrial and home waste and thrown-away items.
